title: Virtual Talk: Gratitude
hero_caption: Alma Thomas. Starry Night and the Astronauts, 1972. Restricted gift of Mary P. Hines in memory of her mother, Frances W. Pick.
short_description: Looking attentively at works of art encourages us to slow down, focus in, and make connections to ourselves and others. Join educator Allison Muscolino for a guided meditation and collection encounter exploring the simplicity and wonder of the present moment.
list_description: Join educator Allison Muscolino for a guided meditation and collection encounter exploring the simplicity and wonder of the present moment.
description:
Looking attentively at works of art encourages us to slow down, focus in, and make connections to ourselves and others. Join educator Allison Muscolino for a guided meditation and collection encounter exploring the simplicity and wonder of the present moment.

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited. Explore all upcoming Virtual Talks.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
